items.title: Market Today: Ratan Tata dies, TCS Q2, GIFT Nifty up 100 pts, Israel war
items.description: At 6:30 AM, GIFT Nifty Futures were up 123 points at 25,207, indicating a gap-up opening for the Indian bourses.

items.title: Should you sell Nifty Auto, IT on rise? Here' what analysts recommend
items.description: The Nifty IT Index is currently trading close to its key resistance level, making it a prime candidate for a "sell on rise" strategy for near-term traders. The resistance level to watch is 43,200

items.title: Buy & Sell, Oct 10; top stock picks by Ajit Mishra of Religare Broking
items.description: Havells witnessed a sharp rally after a breakout from multi-month consolidation phase. However, in line with market corrective phase, the stock retraced towards the neckline of its previous breakout

items.title: Stocks to Watch: Tata stocks, AEL, Vedanta, JSW Infra, ICICI Sec, Jio Fin
items.description: Stock Market Today: Star Health Insurance is undergoing a forensic investigation after a significant data breach affecting 31 million customers.
